document.full_text: heavy metal icon ozzy osbourne and his wife have quickly paid off their $1.7 million u.s. tax debts, a week after learning about their financial troubles from the news media.
document.title: ozzy osbourne pays off $1.7 million tax debts
lines_and_colors: heavy metal icon ozzy osbourne and his wife have quickly paid off their $1.7 million u.s. tax debts, a week after learning about their financial troubles from the news media.
